answers.answer: I was induced at 41+1 and was in labor 14 hours before I had a c section. Baby had a bowel movement inside and his heart rate kept dropping and had cord wrapped around his neck 3 times. He is 4 weeks now and I still think about it everyday. I'm so glad he's here. I was so scared for him.

I was 40 weeks 3 days. I was in labor for 12 hours. Pushed for 1 hour had to get cut all the way to my butt hole. And yes it was a pretty rough time because she had lots of my fluid and she pooped inside of me. We has to have respitory in the room for when she came out. This was all 5 days ago!
You all very strong women. And im scared now. Haha.
I had my son at almost 42 weeks can't remember exactly how long my labor was but it took me almost 3hrs to push him out..I'm getting induced tomorrow with baby #2 and I'll be 40+1 weeks

36w+4d with my daughter, 12 hours of labour ended in emergency c-section coz after so many hours they figured when I had to push that she's in breech position :s Due to complications back then I can't be induced this time
39+3 with my first, 2 1/2 hour labour, natural labour, no stitches no complications and I had no drugs. My boy was a healthy 8lb 13 1/2 oz.Hoping this pregnancy goes the same..
With my first i was 40 weeks water broke with my second i was 38 weeks water broke also now with this one i believe i have a schedule csection

My first at 42+5, 9 hours of labor, 5 minutes of pushing, epidural, no complications, he was 8lb9ozMy second at 37 weeks exactly, 36 hours of labor, 2 pushes, natural, I hemorrhaged when her placenta detached, she was 6lb11ozBoth were very healthy aside from mild cases of jaundice :)
37.6 with my first 7 hours of labor.  37 with my second 10 hours of labor

My first was 41 weeks, 19 hours of back labor, 2 hours pushing, the only complication was that my tailbone broke when she came out.  She was 7 lb 2 oz, and perfect.My second i was 41 and 2 days, 5 hours of labor, pushed 3 times, no complications, he was 8 lb 6 oz.My third i was 39 and 6 days, 20 hours of on and off labor, it would start and stop, had my water broken when I hit 5 cm, she was out 20 min later, 3 pushes, she weiged 8lb even.I had them all completely naturally, no pain medication at all.  No complications other then the tailbone with my first.
With my first...37 weeks...no complications and 36 hrs
38&6 a day short of 39 weeks!

Had my son at 34w2d and I had him naturally no meds and I was in labor for 14 hours from when my water broke until I had him.

I was 40w3d with my first and had to be emergency induced bcuz his heart rate kept dropping was in labor for 24 hrs and pushed for an hour and a half. With my daughter I had her at exactly 40 wks on my due date and went into labor on my own for 9 hrs and pushed for 5 mins!
37And 5 when my water broke, induced the next day because i wasnt going into labor, my son was born at 38 weeks. Long, but so worth it...vaginal delivery.

question: How many weeks were you when you had your baby? Were there complications?  How long were you in labor for?
title: how many weeks were you when you had your baby
